title: Fly High with Jersey Airport‚Äôs Epic Makeover! ‚úàÔ∏è | MSFS 2020 Adventure
description:
Jersey Airport (EGJJ) is an international airport situated in the parish of Saint Peter, 4 NM west northwest of Saint Helier in Jersey, within the Channel Islands. In addition to regular airline services, it supports a vibrant general aviation community, including the Jersey Aero Club. The airport also hosts the annual Jersey International Air Display in September. Isle-Fly and Gama Aviation, which offer global private charter flights, are headquartered at Jersey Airport.

The latest update introduces numerous exciting enhancements to the airport, such as a detailed interior for the terminal and various static scenery elements. Therefore, for those looking to explore the Channel Islands via MSFS or who frequently fly from this airport, the update is highly recommended.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
